name: Lentil Salad with Chimichurri Sauce
author: Kim luvscooking
summary: Steamed lentils mixed with a chimichurri sauce. This recipe, I discovered, is quite good in many ways. It is a favorite in our home on baked Yukon gold potatoes or stuffed in a whole wheat pita with sliced cucumbers. You will most likely find a favorite way to enjoy this healthy, high-fiber salad.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese, or to taste
directions: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add lentils, cover, and steam, adding more water as needed, until tender, 30 to 35 minutes
Transfer cooked lentils to a serving bowl
Blend oil, vinegar, garlic, oregano, red pepper flakes, and salt in a blender until well incorporated
Add parsley and cilantro; pulse only long enough to incorporate the herbs
Drizzle 3 tablespoons chimichurri sauce over lentils; add feta cheese to salad
Store remaining sauce in an airtight container in the refrigerator for another use
